title: Staff Engineer
description:
**Who are we and What do we do?** 




  





 ShareChat (Mohalla Tech Pvt Ltd) is India‚Äôs largest homegrown social media company and the only local player to achieve profitability in the industry, with 200\\+ million Monthly Monetizable Users across all its platforms.
 



  





 Founded in 2015, ShareChat has social media brands such as the ShareChat App and Moj App and micro drama app QuickTV under its portfolio. QuickTV, the newest addition to ShareChat's family of apps, crossed the 10 million downloads mark within 3 months of launch and currently has 60Mn MAUs across the network viewing the vertical episodic content.
 



  





 Today, the ShareChat network maintains a whopping 1,000 Cr ARR and is India‚Äôs leading social media platform servicing users across the country in 15 regional languages. This growth has led to a 28% YoY revenue growth in the July\\-Sept (2025\\-26\\) quarter and increased it by more than 60% in the Oct\\-Dec quarter.
 



  





**What You‚Äôll Do** 




  





**Technical Leadership \\& Architecture** 



* Design and evolve scalable, reliable, and high\\-performance systems.
* Drive architectural decisions aligned with business goals and industry standards.
* Solve complex technical challenges with pragmatic solutions.
* Lead design/code reviews, performance testing, and advanced debugging.
* Explore and prototype emerging technologies to improve architecture.



**Project Leadership \\& Execution** 



* Own large\\-scale, cross\\-functional projects from design to deployment.
* Break down complex problems into actionable tasks and ensure timely delivery.
* Anticipate risks and implement mitigation strategies.



**Mentorship \\& Coaching** 



* Mentor engineers, fostering technical growth and excellence.
* Share best practices and promote a culture of collaboration and learning.



**Strategic Impact** 



* Partner with product and engineering leaders to define technical roadmaps.
* Recommend and adopt new tools/technologies.
* Enhance processes, standards, and system reliability.



  





**Who are you?** 




  




* 8\\-12 years of experience in backend engineering.
* Proven experience in designing and developing large\\-scale, high\\-performance systems.
* Strong collaboration skills with a track record of working effectively with cross\\-functional stakeholders, including product, operations, and business teams.
* Deep understanding of modern technologies, architectures, and industry best practices, with a keen interest in staying up to date with advancements in the field.
* Bachelor's degree (B. Tech. or equivalent) in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline.
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities and a results\\-oriented mindset, with a focus on delivering scalable and efficient solutions.
* Experience in leading or mentoring teams in a fast\\-paced, high\\-growth environment is a plus.
* **Experience with webRTC is a plus**



  





**Where will you be?** 




  





 Bangalore
 



  





**What's in it for you?** 




  





 At ShareChat, our values‚Äî
 **Ownership, Speed, User Empathy, Integrity, and First Principles** 
 ‚Äîare at the core of our ways of working. We believe in hiring top talent and grooming future leaders by providing a flexible environment to aid growth and development.
 



**Our Elite Benefits Suite:**

 ESOPs and comprehensive insurance coverage.
* **Lifestyle:**

* **Family Support:**

title: SDE 2
description:
**Company:** 
 Procedure
   

  

**Website:** 
 Visit Website
   

  

**Business Type:** 
 Small/Medium Business
   

  

**Company Type:** 
 Product \\& Service
   

  

**Business Model:** 
 B2B
   

  

**Funding Stage:** 
 Bootstrapped
   

  

**Industry:** 
 Software Development
   

  

**Job Description**
 Hey there!
   

  

 We are looking for a curious developer to join our
 **Backend** 
 team at Procedure. We are a product development company established in early 2017\\. Before we dive into the job description, allow us to introduce ourselves.
   

  

 Our team is a mixed bag. Of the smart and the hard workers. Of the organised and slightly chaotic. Of the early risers and the burners of the midnight oil. We appreciate diversity and truly like having differing perspectives in the room.
   

  

 We pride ourselves on being early adopters of the latest tools, libraries and frameworks while consistently delivering business value. People who work with us fall in love with their craft. We have changed the definition of "work" for them.
   

  

**Here Are Some Of Our Beliefs About Work**
* Work is only 1 part of your life and not your entire life. We treat it as such.
* Weekends are sacred and not to be messed around with. So you won't be asked to work on one.
* Commuting is a waste of time. Working from home saves you additional time. Go crazy with it.
* Side gigs are welcome. We believe there are multiple avenues to learn and grow. So why restrict it only to work?
* Asynchronous by\\-default. Synchronous communication is expensive, so we default to writing docs and literature to enable async communication.
* Good things come in pairs. Errors get halved. Productivity, ideas and fun get doubled. Learning gets accelerated exponentially.
* Learning from mistakes. If you are not making mistakes and learning from them, you are not growing.


 Apart from work, we continually invest in growing you as a professional and a human.
   

  

* Extensive Boot Camp \\- get to learn, regardless of your experience, about Data Structure and Algorithms, LLD, HLD, DevOps, frontend, backend and/or test engineering.
* Book club \\- broaden your horizons by picking up a book every month and have fun doing so
* P1, The Half Yearly Tech Conference \\- here's where we explore futuristic themes to keep you informed about what's happening in the tech space outside our office.
* Internal Projects \\- where your craft, experiment and learning precedence over deadlines. Also, try out new technologies and domains.


**Growth requires mentorship**
 We believe choosing a mentor is more important than choosing a company. My co\\-founder, Braj, and I have more than a decade of experience in our respective fields. I will be mentoring you to become a better engineer and a coder. Braj will help you with domain expertise, product thinking and problem\\-solving. Ask us how it has helped our ex\\-employees in their careers when you chat with us.
   

  

**What's It Like Here**
 We love debating over languages and frameworks and want someone who can bring their opinions to these discussions. We love reading/sharing articles, podcasts, and tech essays. If you are someone who loves tea or coffee, Marvel or DC, Peterson or Zizek, or even something eclectic, you will feel right at home. Continuous improvement is at the heart of everything we do at work \\& outside.
   

  

**This sounds good. But what exactly will you work on?**
 Since we are a service company, you will have the advantage of working on a wide gamut of problems, technology \\& real world\\-wise. You will be involved in all stages of a product lifecycle. You'll never have to wonder why you are working on something because you'll always know it.
   

  

**What are you currently working on?**
 We carefully select our clients. This is to ensure we are always indexed well on challenging work. They include indie entrepreneurs, Series B/C funded startups and big corporates.
   

  

 Some of the sectors we are working on
   

  

* Healthtech
* Edtech
* Insurtech
* Sportstech
* Fintech
* And much more!


 Trust us, there's never a dull day at work.
   

  

**Here‚Äôs What We Expect From You**
* You love coding and think of it as a craft. We wouldn‚Äôt have it otherwise.
* You have a solid grasp of the basics of Python or JavaScript/TypeScript.
* You‚Äôve built and maintained REST APIs using frameworks like Django/Django Rest Framework (Python) or Express/Fastify (Node.js).
* You understand persistence and can work your way around Django ORM or any SQL/NoSQL store confidently.
* You can set up and own your stack on a cloud provider of your choice.
* You have a good understanding of SOLID principles ‚Äî enough to know when they help and when they don‚Äôt.
* You aren‚Äôt complacent about your skillset and have a hunger to learn more.
* You like to share your learnings with others.


 If you have made it this far, I think we should have a chat. Apply now!

 We are currently seeking a skilled Python Developer to join our team in the Defense \\& Space industry at Canada's Wonderland in Vaughan, ON, Canada. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software solutions to support our defense and space projects.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Designing and implementing efficient and scalable Python code for various defense and space applications
* Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to ensure project requirements are met

**Requirements**

title: Tech Generalist ‚Äì Problem Solver (Backend & Systems Focus)
description:
Bigtoe is a fast\\-growing on\\-site wellness platform operating across the U.S. We run a real production system with real users, real money, and real edge cases.
 



  





 We‚Äôre looking for a tech generalist who enjoys solving messy, real\\-world engineering problems and wants to work across backend logic, systems, and product workflows.
 



  





 This is
 **not** 
 a narrowly defined role with perfect specs. It‚Äôs a role for someone who likes figuring things out.
 



  





**What this role actually is** 




  





 You‚Äôll work on problems where:
 


* requirements evolve as you understand the system better
* backend logic and data flow matter more than UI polish
* edge cases and failure modes are part of the job
* clarity is created through thinking, not handed down in tickets



  





 You‚Äôll collaborate closely with existing engineers and the founder to:
 


* understand how systems behave in production
* simplify and extend backend workflows
* reason through tradeoffs and edge cases
* build new capabilities incrementally and safely



  





 Over time, you‚Äôll naturally take on more responsibility as you understand the system better.
 



  





**What you might work on** 




  





 Examples (not an exhaustive task list):
 


* Backend workflows and APIs with non\\-trivial business logic
* Integrations with external services (communications, payments, etc.)
* Data models and state transitions that must stay correct under edge cases
* Improving reliability, clarity, and maintainability of existing systems
* Using AI tools to accelerate exploration, debugging, and development



  





**Who is a good fit** 




  





 This role is likely a good fit if you:
 



  




* Enjoy thinking through
 **how systems behave** 
 , not just writing code
* Are comfortable working with incomplete or evolving requirements
* Have built and owned systems end\\-to\\-end (even at small scale)
* Don‚Äôt mind reading and improving existing code
* Prefer responsibility and problem\\-solving over rigid instructions
* Are curious, fast\\-learning, and comfortable using AI as a productivity tool


- 


 Early\\-career engineers (1‚Äì4 years) with strong fundamentals are very welcome.
 



 Laravel experience is not required ‚Äî ability to learn quickly is.
 



  





**This role is not a good fit if** 




  





 We want to be explicit here:
 



  




* You prefer clearly defined tickets and specs
* You come primarily from a services/consulting background
* You avoid legacy code or refactoring
* You‚Äôre mainly interested in frontend/UI work, PM roles, or AI demos
* You‚Äôre looking for a narrow, well\\-scoped specialist position



  





**Why this role exists** 




  





 As the product grows, backend systems and decision\\-making matter more than raw execution speed. We‚Äôre looking for someone who wants to grow into deeper ownership over time, not just ship isolated features.
 



  





 You‚Äôll have direct exposure to real product decisions and the chance to meaningfully shape how systems evolve.
 



  





**Experience \\& background** 




  





 We care more about how you think than specific titles or stacks.
 



  





 That said, strong candidates typically have:
 


* 1‚Äì5 years of hands\\-on engineering experience
* Solid backend fundamentals (any language/framework)
* Evidence of end\\-to\\-end ownership in past projects
* Comfort reading unfamiliar codebases
* The ability to learn new systems quickly



**One last note** 




  





 If you enjoy ambiguity, responsibility, and solving real engineering problems ‚Äî this role will feel energizing.
 



  





 If you‚Äôre looking for structure, tickets, and predictability ‚Äî it probably won‚Äôt.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Cloud/HPC
description:
**Job Overview**
 Arm‚Äôs hardware is at the heart of the computing and connectivity revolution that continues to transform the way people live, and businesses operate. Working as a team and engaging with the world‚Äôs most famous technology companies, we are driving innovation into all areas where computation is possible. This will facilitate us to build better solutions for the billions of people using our technology worldwide based \\#onArm.
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer who will be developing and deploying innovative dashboards and automation to support the entire cloud, compute \\& storage infrastructure for all the SOC design team across Solutions Engineering. The candidate should be able to effectively communicate \\& collaborate with peers in their own team as well as with their counterparts in design engineering teams.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Development of automation, dashboards and cloud based solutions for effective and efficient management of design infrastructure
* Partnership \\& communication with peers for a broader collaboration


****Required Skills and Experience:****
* Bachelor‚Äôs/master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or Electronic Engineering from a reputable institute
* 4\\-8 years of shown experience.
* Deep expertise with IBM Platform LSF, including job lifecycle automation, distributed workload orchestration, resource allocation policies, and cluster configuration.
* Ability to develop automation that communicates with LSF (bsub, bjobs, lsload, bacct, etc.) and parse scheduling logs for insights.
* Experience improving cluster efficiency through job pattern analysis, fair\\-share tuning, and capacity modeling


****‚ÄúNice To Have‚Äù Skills and Experience:****
* Experience integrating LSF with HPC environments, cloud bursting (AWS ParallelCluster / custom HPC), and hybrid scheduling strategies.
* Knowledge of LSF event daemons, job arrays, resource reservation, and multi\\-cluster configurations


 At Arm, we are proud to have a set of behaviors that reflect our culture and guide our decisions, defining how we work together to defy ordinary and shape extraordinary.
   

  

 Our
 **10x mindset** 
 guides how we engineer, collaborate, and grow. Understand what it means and how to reflect 10x in your work: https://careers.arm.com/en/10x\\-mindset
   

  

****Accommodations at Arm****
 At Arm, we want to build extraordinary teams. If you need an adjustment or an accommodation during the recruitment process, please email accommodations@arm.com . To note, by sending us the requested information, you consent to its use by Arm to arrange for appropriate accommodations. All accommodation or adjustment requests will be treated with confidentiality, and information concerning these requests will only be disclosed as necessary to provide the accommodation. Although this is not an exhaustive list, examples of support include breaks between interviews, having documents read aloud, or office accessibility. Please email us about anything we can do to accommodate you during the recruitment process.
   

  

****Hybrid Working at Arm****
 Arm‚Äôs approach to hybrid working is designed to create a working environment that supports both high performance and personal wellbeing. We believe in bringing people together face to face to enable us to work at pace, whilst recognizing the value of flexibility. Within that framework, we empower groups/teams to determine their own hybrid working patterns, depending on the work and the team‚Äôs needs. Details of what this means for each role will be shared upon application. In some cases, the flexibility we can offer is limited by local legal, regulatory, tax, or other considerations, and where this is the case, we will collaborate with you to find the best solution. Please talk to us to find out more about what this could look like for you.
   

  

****Equal Opportunities at Arm****
 Arm is an equal opportunity employer, committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal opportunities are available to all applicants and colleagues. We are a diverse organization of dedicated and innovative individuals, and don‚Äôt discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

title: SRE
description:
**Who We Are**
 Motive empowers the people who run physical operations with tools to make their work safer, more productive, and more profitable. For the first time ever, safety, operations and finance teams can manage their drivers, vehicles, equipment, and fleet related spend in a single system. Combined with industry leading AI, the Motive platform gives you complete visibility and control, and significantly reduces manual workloads by automating and simplifying tasks.
   

  

 Motive serves nearly 100,000 customers ‚Äì from Fortune 500 enterprises to small businesses ‚Äì across a wide range of industries, including transportation and logistics, construction, energy, field service, manufacturing, agriculture, food and beverage, retail, and the public sector.
   

  

 Visit gomotive.com to learn more.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Site Reliability Engineer on the Platform team, your role will be crucial in helping us design, scale, and manage our growing AWS\\-backed infrastructure. Your expertise will contribute to scaling our architecture and building a highly available system with an enthusiastic team. We are looking for candidates who have production experience with AWS\\-based platforms, expertise in automating distributed systems, scaling a fast\\-growing platform, maintaining high availability, and a forward\\-thinking mindset ready to take on tomorrow's challenges.
   

  

**What You‚Äôll Do**
* Automate the provisioning, scaling, and management of our infrastructure using Configuration As Code and Configuration Management
* Work with other engineering and product teams to design and build the infrastructure required to deliver new features to customers
* Identify and remove bottlenecks from systems in production
* Ensure 99\\.9% customer\\-facing uptime
* Continuously improve the monitoring and alerting capabilities of our platform, enabling us to be proactive instead of reactive
* Create deployment pipelines; take code from git to production


**What We‚Äôre Looking For**
* 5\\+ years of professional SRE/DevOps experience, and a demonstrated ability to work on high volume production systems
* Working knowledge of AWS services and technologies (Redshift, DynamoDB, Kinesis, RDS, ELB, AutoScaling, Lambda, etc‚Ä¶)
* Experience with infrastructure as code and configuration management (Terraform, Nix, Ansible, CloudFormation, Chef, etc...), and with build managers such as Bazel, Pants, Buck
* Knowledge of Python, Bash or other scripting languages. Knowledge of Ruby, or Golang is a plus.


*Creating a diverse and inclusive workplace is one of Motive's core values. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives.*
*Please review our Candidate Privacy Notice here.*
*UK Candidate Privacy Notice here.*
*The applicant must be authorized to receive and access those commodities and technologies controlled under U.S. Export Administration Regulations. It is Motive's policy to require that employees be authorized to receive access to Motive products and technology.*

**Job Description**
 Greetings.
   

  

 Accion Labs is a GenAI first Innovation Engineering Services \\& Solutions company headquartered in Pittsburgh, our core purpose is to impact lives by transforming businesses through innovation. With a presence in 23 global locations, Accion Labs boasts an engineering headcount of more than 5,500\\+ employees. The company engages with its clients through collaborative, white\\-box engagement models that include extended teams and turn\\-key projects. Accion Labs excels in building new products and re\\-engineering legacy products using state\\-of\\-the\\-art technologies and innovation. Led by an entrepreneurial leadership team that prioritizes execution, outcomes, and continuous learning, Accion Labs has been recognized as one of Pittsburgh‚Äôs fastest\\-growing companies by the Pittsburgh Business Times and as a leader in innovation by Smart Business Magazine.
   

  

**Tech stack**
* AWS (EFS, EC2, SGW, ASG, NLB, and more)
* Terraform \\& Ansible for infrastructure as code
* Kubernetes (K8s) and Docker
* Grafana \\& Sentry for observability (metrics, logs, alerts)
* Apache Airflow for data\\-processing pipelines
* Python as the primary programming and scripting language.


**Requirements**
* Linux: confident with the command line and system fundamentals
* Computer networking: diagnostic tools such as ping, traceroute, mtr, netstat/ss, dig
* Kubernetes \\& Docker: ability to explore a cluster, inspect pods/containers
* GitLab / Git: working knowledge of Git workflows and key commands
* Python: ability to read, write, and debug basic scripts
* English: professional working proficiency (spoken and written).


**What You‚Äôll Do**
* Monitor services and detect, register, and triage incidents
* Resolve or escalate incidents to the appropriate teams
* Fulfil service requests from our clients
* Deploy software changes via GitLab CI/CD pipelines.

title: Lead backend developer
description:
**Company Description** 




**LAKKSHIONS IT PRIVATE LIMITED is a global technology company focused on building secure, scalable backend systems for enterprise and SaaS products. The company works on designing and developing modern technology solutions with an emphasis on backend architecture, API development, system security, and Agentic AI‚Äìdriven ERP tools** 
 . With teams operating across locations, Lakkshions IT delivers reliable, performance\\-driven platforms aligned with enterprise requirements.
 



  





**Role Description** 




**This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Senior Back End Developer with 8\\+ years of experience** 
 , based in Hyderabad. The role involves designing and building secure, scalable backend systems for enterprise and SaaS products, including
 **Agentic AI‚Äìenabled ERP platforms** 
 . The Senior Back End Developer will be responsible for backend architecture, API design, authorization strategy, and multi\\-tenant SaaS security. The role includes leading database and integration efforts while collaborating with front\\-end teams. The developer will also focus on performance optimization and maintaining compliance\\-ready backend systems.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




**Strong expertise in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development with 8\\+ years of experience** 




**Proficiency in Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts** 




**Basic knowledge of Front\\-End Development to collaborate with front\\-end teams** 




**Proficient programming skills using Python, FastAPI, Spring Boot, or NestJS** 




**Experience with databases such as PostgreSQL and Neo4j, including data modeling and performance optimization** 




**Hands\\-on experience with scripting using Python or Bash** 




**Strong experience with security and authentication including Auth0, OAuth 2\\.0, OpenID Connect, RBAC/FGA, and JWT\\-based API security** 




**Experience working with Agentic AI‚Äìbased systems and ERP tools** 




**Experience in designing authorization strategies for enterprise and SaaS applications** 




**Excellent problem\\-solving skills with a focus on scalable and secure backend systems** 




**Bachelor‚Äôs or higher degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field** 




**Experience working in agile environments and using version control systems such as Git** 




  





  





  





  




-

title: Senior MERN Stack Developer
description:
**Job Title: Senior Full Stack Developer** 




**Location: Pune (Hybrid)** 




**Experience: 6\\+ yrs** 




**Role Type: Full\\-Time\\*** 




  





**About the Role:** 




  





 We are seeking a highly accomplished Senior Full Stack Developer with a strong background in end\\-to\\-end application development, ideally with extensive experience working on projects for international clients. The successful candidate will be responsible for architecting, developing, and maintaining scalable, secure, and high\\-performance web applications. You will play a pivotal role in technical leadership, working closely with cross\\-functional teams, clients, and stakeholders to deliver innovative solutions that meet business needs.
 







**Key Responsibilities:** 




  





 End\\-to\\-End Development: Lead the full lifecycle of web application development, from requirement analysis, architecture design, coding, testing, deployment, to ongoing maintenance.
 



 Client Collaboration: Engage directly with international clients to understand their requirements, provide technical consultations, showcase prototypes, and translate business needs into robust technical solutions.
 



  





 Backend Development: Design and develop scalable backend services using Node.js and other Java frameworks, ensuring high availability and reliability.
 



  





 Frontend Development: Build modern, responsive, and user\\-friendly interfaces using React.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, with an emphasis on usability and performance.
 



  





 Cloud \\& Infrastructure Management: Deploy, manage, and optimize applications on AWS cloud environments, leveraging services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, etc.
 



  





 API Integration \\& Microservices: Develop and consume RESTful APIs, microservices, and third\\-party integrations to create a seamless user experience.
 



  





 Database Design: Architect and optimize relational and non\\-relational databases, ensuring data integrity and security.
 



  





 Code Quality \\& Best Practices: Enforce coding standards, perform code reviews, and establish best practices for code maintainability and testability.
 



  





 Mentorship \\& Leadership: Guide junior developers, facilitate technical knowledge sharing, and promote best practices within the team.
 



  





 Performance \\& Security: Conduct performance tuning, security audits, and ensure compliance with industry standards.
 



  





 Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends; propose innovative ideas to improve existing systems.
 







 Qualifications \\& Skills:
 



 Experience: Min 6\\-8 years of proven experience in full stack development, specifically in building complex enterprise applications.
 



  





**Technical Skills:** 




 Expert in Node.js, React.js, JavaScript, HTML/CSS
 



 Strong experience with AWS cloud services (deployment, monitoring, scaling)
 



 Proficiency in Java with Spring Boot and Hibernate
 



 Hands\\-on experience with RESTful API development and microservices architecture
 



 Database management with MySQL, PostgreSQL, or other RDBMS, and familiarity with NoSQL databases is a plus
 



 Comfortable working with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and version control (git)
 



 Knowledge of security best practices, OAuth, JWT, SSL/TLS, etc.
 



 Client Interaction: Experience working directly with international clients, understanding their business contexts, and providing value\\-added solutions.
 



 Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills; confident in technical discussions, presentations, and stakeholder management.
 



 Problem\\-Solving: Strong analytical skills, with focus on delivering practical and innovative solutions.
 







**What We Offer:** 




  





 Competitive salary package commensurate with experience and skillset.
 



 Full health benefits and performance bonuses.
 



 Opportunities to work on cutting\\-edge projects for global clients.
 



 A collaborative, innovative, and inclusive workplace environment.
 



 Opportunities for professional growth, leadership, and skill development.
 



 Flexible working arrangements and a vibrant office environment in Pune.
 







 If you are passionate about building scalable applications, working with international clients, and leading technical teams to success, we want to hear from you!

title: IN_Senior Associate_CSV_ITRA_Advisory_Bangalore
description:
**Line of Service**
 Advisory
   

  


**Industry/Sector**
 Not Applicable
   

  


**Specialism**
 Deals
   

  


**Management Level**
 Senior Associate
   

  


**Job Description \\& Summary**
 At PwC, our people in audit and assurance focus on providing independent and objective assessments of financial statements, internal controls, and other assurable information enhancing the credibility and reliability of this information with a variety of stakeholders. They evaluate compliance with regulations including assessing governance and risk management processes and related controls.
   

  

 Those in internal audit at PwC help build, optimise and deliver end\\-to\\-end internal audit services to clients in all industries. This includes IA function setup and transformation, co\\-sourcing, outsourcing and managed services, using AI and other risk technology and delivery models. IA capabilities are combined with other industry and technical expertise, in areas like cyber, forensics and compliance, to address the full spectrum of risks. This helps organisations to harness the power of IA to help the organisation protect value and navigate disruption, and obtain confidence to take risks to power growth.
   

  


 \\*Why PWC
 

 At PwC, you will be part of a vibrant community of solvers that leads with trust and creates distinctive outcomes for¬†our clients and communities. This purpose\\-led and values\\-driven work, powered by technology in an environment that drives innovation, will enable you to make a tangible impact in the real world. We reward your contributions, support your wellbeing, and offer inclusive benefits, flexibility programmes and mentorship that will help you thrive in work and life. Together, we grow, learn, care, collaborate, and create a future of infinite experiences for¬†each other. Learn more
 
 ¬†
 



 about us
 


 .
 
 At PwC, we believe in providing equal employment opportunities, without any discrimination on the grounds of gender, ethnic background, age, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, pregnancy, gender identity or expression, religion or other beliefs, perceived differences and status protected by law. We strive to create an environment where each one of our people can bring their true selves and contribute to their personal growth and the firm‚Äôs growth. To enable this, we have zero tolerance for any discrimination and harassment based on the above considerations. "
   

  

 Responsibilities ¬∑ Having 4\\-8 years of work experience in Computer System Validation (CSV), Software Testing and IT Compliance. ¬∑ Exposure in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC). ¬∑ Knowledge of SDLC methodology like Waterfall and Agile model and V model of CSV. ¬∑ Experience in manual testing like Positive \\& Negative Testing, Regression Testing, Smoke, Sanity Testing and defect tracking and reporting. (Preferred exposure to CSV tools such as Valgenesis) ¬∑ Knowledge of GAMP5 Guideline, GxP, US FDA 21 CFR Part 11, EU Annex 11 and ALCOA\\+ principles. ¬∑ Knowledge of Change Control, Deviation Management, CAPA and Periodic Review. ¬∑ Experience in authoring Computer System Validation deliverables like GxP Assessment, Validation Plan (VP), User Requirement Specifications(URS), Functional Requirement Specifications(FRS), Functional Risk Assessment (FRA) using FMEA, Design Specifications (DS), IQ/OQ/PQ protocols, Validation Summary Report (VSR)
   

  

 Mandatory Skills CSV
   

  

 Preferred Skills LIMS/QMS
   

  

 Years of Experience 4\\-8 years
   

  

 Education Qualification\\-B.Tech/B.Pharm/M.Pharm
   

  

  

  


**Education**

*(if blank, degree and/or field of study not specified)*

 Degrees/Field of Study required: Bachelor of Technology
   

  

 Degrees/Field of Study preferred:
   

  


**Certifications**
*(if blank, certifications not specified)*

**Required Skills**
 CSV
   

  


**Optional Skills**
 Accepting Feedback, Accepting Feedback, Accounting and Financial Reporting Standards, Active Listening, Analytical Thinking, Artificial Intelligence (AI) Platform, Auditing, Auditing Methodologies, Business Process Improvement, Communication, Compliance Auditing, Corporate Governance, Creativity, Data Analysis and Interpretation, Data Ingestion, Data Modeling, Data Quality, Data Security, Data Transformation, Data Visualization, Embracing Change, Emotional Regulation, Empathy, Financial Accounting, Financial Audit {\\+ 24 more}
